name: The Bunnyman
description:
Have you ever heard of The Bunny Man?

It is 1972 , a pregnant woman has disappeared in Clifton, Virginia. The police and local community has been searching for her for weeks, but now they have given up hope.

You are a journalist and you refuse to give up on your wife. You'll do anything to find her—even if it means risking your own life. You have to find her before it's too late.

You've heard rumors about something in the Clifton forest, a creature who stalks and toy's with those who enter his forest at night. They say it walks between worlds and dwells in the darkness. No one knows what it exactly looks like or how to defeat it. But there's one thing they agree on: if you see it in the woods, there is no escape...

Features:

  • Gameplay: First-person survival horror featuring a dark twisted storyline.

  • Puzzles and riddles: Progressively more difficult puzzles as you venture deeper into Clifton Creek.

  • Deduction System: Combine photos and other clues to gain insights on the lore with different ending's dependent on what you uncover.
